duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead projects and manage other engineers/designers to maintain scope, schedule, and budget
Develop technical proposals, project schedules, PFDs, and P&IDs
Size and specify process equipment and piping systems, and develop 3D process models
Mentor less experienced engineers and designers
Interface with vendors and clients, review construction submittals and answer RFIs
Develop construction verification and commissioning plans, assist with resource planning

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering from an ABET-accredited school
